title: The man who committed the New Zealand stabbing attack was a known threat. Now, the nation's counterterrorism laws are under scrutiny.
content:
1. The man who committed the New Zealand stabbing attack was a known threat. Now, the nation's counterterrorism laws are under scrutiny.  The Washington Post
  2. New Zealand supermarket stabbing: Government to toughen anti-terror laws  BBC News
  3. NZ Police Commissioner Coster on timeline of day of New Lynn terror attack | RNZ  RNZ
  4. Auckland mall terrorist attack: Attacker named as Kiwis of all backgrounds unite to condemn him  New Zealand Herald
  5. New Zealand vows anti-terror laws change after supermarket attack  Euronews
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ニュージーランドの刺殺事件を起こした男は、既知の脅威であった。今、この国のテロ対策法が吟味されています。
实施新西兰刺杀袭击的男子是一个已知的威胁。现在，该国的反恐法律正受到审查。
實施新西蘭刺殺襲擊的男子是一個已知的威脅。現在，該國的反恐法律正受到審查。
